wikipedia_page.main: Gordon Edward Fowler (4 September 1886 – 26 November 1953) was a sailor from Great Britain, who represented his country at the 1924 Summer Olympics in Meulan and Le Havre, France. Fowler took the silver in the 8 Metre and 7th in the Monotype. He also competed at the 1928 Summer Olympics in Amsterdam, Netherlands, where he became 8th in the 1928 competition.
